name: HIBIKAKEYIRONOKISEKI / 裂色的奇迹 / ひびかけ色のキセキ
description: There are six magicians with rich and different characteristics waiting for you to cultivate. You can strengthen their skills to fight with strong bosses.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows xp/7/8/10 Processor: Intel Core 2 Quad Q6600 @ 2.4 GHz, AMD FX 8120 @ 3.1 GHz Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GT 630 / 650m, AMD Radeon HD6570 or equivalent Storage: 1 GB available space Sound Card: 100% DirectX 9.0c compatible sound card
